mapper.sql: id, name, sex, birthday, departmentDuties, officeTelephone, homePhone, mobilePhone, email, postCode, QQNumber, contactAddress, hobby, taboo, remark
mapper.insert: insert into contacts (id, name, sex, birthday, departmentDuties, officeTelephone, homePhone, mobilePhone, email, postCode, QQNumber, contactAddress, hobby, taboo, remark ) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{sex}, #{birthday}, #{departmentDuties}, #{officeTelephone}, #{homePhone}, #{mobilePhone}, #{email}, #{postCode}, #{QQNumber}, #{contactAddress}, #{hobby}, #{taboo}, #{remark} )
mapper.update: update contacts set name = #{name}, sex = #{sex}, birthday = #{birthday}, departmentDuties = #{departmentDuties}, officeTelephone = #{officeTelephone}, homePhone = #{homePhone}, mobilePhone = #{mobilePhone}, email = #{email}, postCode = #{postCode}, QQNumber = #{QQNumber}, contactAddress = #{contactAddress}, hobby = #{hobby}, taboo = #{taboo}, remark = #{remark} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from contacts order by convert(name using gbk)
